Title: Ricardio the Heart Guy
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Merriwether Williams (story by), Timothy McKeon (story by), Adam Muto (story by), Bert Youn, Sean Jimenez
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, George Takei, Tom Kenny
Plot: A new stranger arrives in the Candy Kingdom: a charismatic talking heart named Ricardio. He soon becomes very popular, except to Finn who believes he's hiding something.
